summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Valentine's Day proposal website. All core features working perfectly including mischievous No button behavior, confetti celebration, and mobile responsiveness.

design_issues.issue: Some external Lottie animation resources returning 403 errors
design_issues.note: App gracefully handles with fallback images/emojis

design_issues.issue: React console warnings about unrecognized props on DOM elements
design_issues.note: Functionality not affected, just console warnings

passed_tests: Homepage loads with floating hearts background (15 hearts)
Form validation and submission with valentine name, message, character selection
Create proposal API generates unique UUID links
Copy link and Preview buttons functional
Proposal page loads correctly at /proposal/:uuid route
Valentine name and custom message display properly
No button mischievous behavior: moves on hover, changes text, disappears after 3 attempts
Yes button grows larger with each No attempt
Yes button click triggers heart confetti celebration
Success message displays after Yes click
Mobile responsive design - all elements accessible
Backend API: 11/11 tests passed (CRUD operations, validation, UUID generation)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core features working, minor external resource issues)
